question: Which country is the chair of BRICS 2021?
explanation:
For the year 2021, India has assumed the chairmanship of BRICS. Recently, BRICS Contact Group on Economic and Trade Issues (CGETI) held its first meeting under India’s chairmanship from March 9 to 11.
The theme of this year’s BRICS is “BRICS@15: Intra BRICS Cooperation for Continuity, Consolidation, and Consensus”.
